SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am13.network.socket

Class GameListenerServerSocket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am13.network.socket.GameListenerServerSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameListener, Serializable
public class GameListenerServerSocket extends Object implements GameListener
This class is the socket implementation of GameListener. It handles the communication between the server and the clients. It contains methods to update the game state of the clients.
See Also:

    • updateStartGame

      public void updateStartGame(GameModelIF model, GameController controller)
      Updates the client that the game has started: starter cards and initial cards have been given to the players. The client is notified passing the GameModelIF containing a GameModel with GameStatus set to INIT.
      Specified by:
      updateStartGame in interface GameListener
      Parameters:
      model - The game model containing current game's state for the newly started game
      controller - The controller of the newly started game

    • updateEndGame

      public void updateEndGame()
      Updates the client about ending of game. After this update, the server should not respond to any other request from the clients

    • updateGameModel

      public void updateGameModel(GameModelIF model, GameController controller, PlayerLobby player)
      Description copied from interface: GameListener
      This method should be called ONLY when a player reconnects to the game. Updates the client of the reconnected player with the updated game model and corresponding player.
      Specified by:
      updateGameModel in interface GameListener
      Parameters:
      model - The updated game model
      controller - The controller of the game
      player - The updated player who is reconnecting.
